body.p: offers a plugin to integrate an AI Positron view that provides an advanced solution for using AI assistance to enhance the documentation content creation process. By leveraging the power of AI platforms, the AI Positron streamlines and enhances the writing experience by providing a variety of helpful AI-based actions and features, ways to chat and refine responses, and much more.

ul.li: The AI Positron view is only accessible for Content Fusion users with a platform user role of Author.
The AI Positron view is not available if the Disable AI-powered features option is selected in the Organization Settings page.
The AI Positron view is only available if an administrator has integrated it in the organization's Content Fusion server.

body.p: For information about the AI Positron and its features, see AI Positron View (Content Fusion).
For installation and configuration details, see Oxygen AI Positron for Content Fusion.
